alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Blanco; Burnet; Gillespie; Hays; Lee; Llano; Travis; Williamson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 21 at 1:49PM CDT until August 21 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions are expected across all of South Central Texas today and across northern portions of South Central Texas on Tuesday... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR SOUTH CENTRAL TEXAS... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 8 PM CDT TUESDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR NORTHERN PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL TEXAS... The National Weather Service in Austin/San Antonio has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 1 PM to 8 PM CDT Tuesday. * WINDS...East 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 23 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop can spread rapidly and exhibit high resistance to control. Any outdoor activity that could produce flames or sparks is discouraged.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Bastrop; Blanco; Burnet; Gillespie; Hays; Lee; Llano; Travis; Williamson
